front.title: IEEE Standard Test Procedures and Requirements for Alternating-Current Cable Terminations 2.5 kV Through 765 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: All indoor and outdoor cable terminations used on alternating-current cables having laminated or extruded insulation rated 2.5 kV through 765 kV are covered, except for separable insulated connectors, which are covered by IEEE Std 386-1995.
